short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows BobcatCRM to open a new Window with multiple tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows Bobcat to open documents in other tabs to support a better working process

*Popups from bobcatcrm.com must be allowed for extension to work.
